data.title: Top 18 Book Publishing Powerhouses in the US
data.meta_description: Discover the Best Book Publishing Companies in the US. Explore Penguin Random House and Scholastic for top-quality reads!
data.text:
The book publishing industry is a diverse and dynamic sector that is responsible for bringing a wide range of literary content to readers. This industry is made up of various companies that specialize in acquiring, editing, producing, distributing, and marketing books. These companies work with authors, agents, and other industry professionals to create engaging and high-quality books for different genres and interests.With the rise of digital technology, the industry has seen significant changes in recent years. E-books and audiobooks have become popular formats for reading, and online platforms have provided new opportunities for self-publishing and independent authors. Additionally, the industry has embraced new marketing strategies and online platforms to reach a broader audience, utilizing social media, influencers, and targeted advertising.In the future, the book publishing industry is likely to continue evolving as technology advances and consumer preferences change. Companies will need to adapt to new formats and distribution channels while maintaining their commitment to producing compelling and relevant content that connects with readers.

Top 18 Book Publishing Companies in the US

1. Penguin Random House

Headquarter: New York, New York, United States

Founded: 2013

Headcount: 10001+

LinkedIn

Penguin Random House is a publishing company that offers a wide range of books and other literary content. They are known for publishing works from various authors and genres, catering to different interests and audiences.

2. Scholastic

Headquarter: New York, New York, United States

Founded: 1920

Headcount: 5001-10000

LinkedIn

Scholastic is a publishing company that offers educational resources for teachers and students. They provide print and digital magazines, books, and multimedia teaching tools to support literacy and engage students in learning.

3. Simon & Schuster

Headquarter: New York, New York, United States

Headcount: 1001-5000

LinkedIn

Simon and Schuster is a publishing company that offers a wide range of books in various genres, such as literature, biographies, comics, and history. They provide both hardcover and paperback formats, catering to different preferences of readers.

4. Amherst College

Headquarter: Amherst, Massachusetts, United States

Founded: 1821

Headcount: 1001-5000

LinkedIn

Amherst College Press is a publishing company that produces pathbreaking scholarship with a liberal arts ethos and makes it available worldwide as digital, open-access work. They specialize in publishing books, series, and scholarly content in various fields.

5. Hachette Book Group

Headquarter: New York, New York, United States

Headcount: 1001-5000

LinkedIn

Hachette Book Group is a publishing company that offers a wide range of fiction and non-fiction books across various genres, including mystery & thriller, romance, sci-fi & fantasy, and children's literature.

6. HarperCollins Publishers

Headquarter: New York, New York, United States

Founded: 1817

Headcount: 1001-5000

LinkedIn

HarperCollins Publishers is a leading global publishing company that offers a wide range of books across various genres. With a history of more than 65 years, their Peterson Field Guides have set the standard by which other field guides are measured. They provide comprehensive and authoritative information on birds, mammals, reptiles, amphibians, fishes, insects, ecology, and more. Their publications are essential additions to any naturalist's bookshelf or backpack.

7. Author Solutions, LLC

Headquarter: Bloomington, Indiana, United States

Founded: 1997

Headcount: 1001-5000

LinkedIn

Author Solutions is a leader in supported self-publishing, providing technology and services to make publishing easy, affordable, and available to anyone. They work with authors to develop new literary talent and give them platforms to reach readers worldwide.

8. HarperCollins Christian Publishing

Headquarter: Nashville, Tennessee, United States

Headcount: 201-500

LinkedIn

HarperCollins Christian Publishing is a company that focuses on publishing Christian literature and providing Christian resources. They offer a wide range of books, including fiction, non-fiction, children's books, and self-publishing options.

9. Candlewick Press

Headquarter: Somerville, Massachusetts, United States

Founded: 1991

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

Candlewick is a publishing company that specializes in children's books. They offer a wide range of fiction and non-fiction titles for different age groups. With a focus on diversity and inclusivity, their books showcase stories from BIPOC authors. Candlewick also supports initiatives against censorship.

10. Zondervan Publishers

Headquarter: Grand Rapids, Michigan, United States

Founded: 1931

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

Zondervan.com is a company that offers religious books, Bibles, and study materials. They provide a range of publications aimed at facilitating spiritual growth and knowledge.

11. Baker Publishing Group

Headquarter: Ada, Michigan, United States

Founded: 1939

Headcount: 201-500

LinkedIn

Baker Publishing Group is a company that offers a wide range of books and resources, including Christian literature and devotionals. They provide a variety of titles on topics such as theology, heaven, and the New Earth, catering to individuals looking for spiritual guidance and growth.

12. Grand Central Publishing

Headquarter: New York, United States

Founded: 2006

Headcount: 201-500

LinkedIn

Grand Central Publishing is a publishing company that offers a wide range of fiction and nonfiction books across various genres, including mystery, romance, sci-fi, fantasy, and young adult. They publish works by bestselling authors and cater to diverse reading interests.

13. Tate Publishing

Headquarter: Mustang, Oklahoma, United States

Headcount: 1-10

LinkedIn

Tate Publishing is a company that offers publishing services to authors. They help authors in editing, designing, and distributing their books. With a focus on self-publishing, Tate Publishing provides a platform for authors to share their stories and reach a wider audience.

14. Simon & Schuster Children's Publishing

Headquarter: New York, New York, United States

Founded: 1924

Headcount: 201-500

LinkedIn

Simon & Schuster is a publishing company that offers a wide range of books in various genres. They provide bestsellers, new releases, and author information. They also have divisions and imprints dedicated to specific genres and audiences.

15. Sourcebooks

Founded: 1987

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

Sourcebooks.com is an online platform that offers a wide range of books across various genres, including fiction, young adult, mystery, romance, and nonfiction. They have a collection of bestselling books, educational resources, and support for book clubs. The platform also specializes in personalized books through their subsidiary, Put Me In The Story. Sourcebooks.com aims to inspire readers and create memorable reading experiences.

16. Page Publishing

Headquarter: Conneaut Lake, Pennsylvania, United States

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

Page Publishing is a professional publishing company that handles all the intricacies involved in publishing books, including distribution and generating royalties. They offer services such as eBook conversion, establishing wholesale accounts, shipping, and more, allowing authors to focus on writing and creating. Authors who have worked with Page Publishing praise their professionalism, attention to detail, and dedication to their clients.

17. Harvest House Publishers

Headquarter: United States

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

Harvest House Publishers is a company that offers a diverse range of books for various readers. Their catalog includes both fiction and nonfiction books covering topics such as Christian Living, Romance, Prophecy, and more. They also offer Bible studies, children's books, and inspirational materials.

18. Wipf and Stock Publishers

Headquarter: Eugene, Oregon, United States

Founded: 1995

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

Wipf & Stock is a publishing company that offers a wide range of books covering various subjects. They specialize in publishing Christian and theological works, including books on counseling, psychotherapy, worship, power, and biblical studies. With a focus on quality and diverse topics, Wipf & Stock aims to provide valuable resources for authors and readers.
